alert.note: Alert for Dragoon, Mule, Huachuca and Santa Rita Mountains including Bisbee, Canelo Hills, Madera Canyon; Eastern Cochise County Below 5000 Feet including Douglas, Willcox; Upper San Pedro River Valley including Sierra Vista, Benson (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 09 at 7:15PM MST by NWS Tucson
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Cochise County through 745 PM MST... At 715 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Bisbee, moving north at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Bisbee and Naco. This includes the following highways... Route 80 between mile markers 334 and 355. Route 92 between mile markers 346 and 355. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
